on_boarding.title: Newly Created Educational Initiative
on_boarding.title_1: A more interesting IELTS learning app! Eliminate the boredom and dryness of traditional exam preparation methods.
on_boarding.title_2: The app provides you with simple but useful IELTS lessons such as Pronunciation, Multiple Choice, Fill in the Blank. Just <bold>5 minutes a day</bold> to practice IELTS!
on_boarding.title_3: Accumulate experience points through lessons and tasks to be <bold>promoted and ranked up</bold>, the Master position is waiting for you!
on_boarding.title_4: For each completed lesson, you will be rewarded with Carrots, use Carrots to <bold>buy AI grading attempts</bold> at the LAPINLEARN store!
on_boarding.description: Select suitable teaching approaches and methods that align with the content, learning goals, and participants’ requirements.

map.encourage: Let’s upgrade your IELTS skill today!

streak.max: {{max}} is the longest streak you have achieved!

update.title: Update App
update.message: A new version of the app is ready. Please update to continue.
